Michael Vick 's got it all at this point,'' Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game. Mr David Cameron said in a statement: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. '' Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government.
